WorkItem.Description: From some reason, Chirpy didnt work until I changed file to utf-8 without signature.

Comments.Message: I'm replicating the same exact problem. I've seen this in other places too that UTF-8 with signature is not properly supported in a lot of cases.

Additional info:

OS: Windows 7 x64
Culture: en-US

This problem only occurs when you have "Smart run T4MVC" turned on.

There really needs to be an edit button.
GregWa, did you figure out a way to work around this? Suddenly my files are not being generated, even though Chirpy logs on saving the config file. I'm also on Win7 x64.
